member.name: TRUSTED_PASSWORD_INFO
member.summary: The TRUSTED_PASSWORD_INFO structure is used to query or set the password for a trusted domain. The and functions use this structure when their InformationClass parameters are set to TrustedPasswordInformation.

member.name: TRUSTED_PASSWORD_INFO.Password
member.summary: An structure that contains the password to use when creating an authenticated connection to the domain.

member.name: TRUSTED_PASSWORD_INFO.OldPassword
member.summary: An structure that contains the old password. On set operations, if the Buffer member of this structure is NULL, the old password is set to the current password.
